price: Na mnajenga majengo ya fakhari kama kwamba mtaishi milele!
footnotes: Na mnajenga majumba ya fakhari na imara, na mahodhi ya maji, kwa kutaraji kuishi milele katika dunia hii, kama kwamba hamtakufa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
